did.unittitle: Risposta di Valentino Vespajo In Difesa di D. Pietro Carrera contra di Allessandro Salvio

scopecontent.p: This small undated volume is written in Italian. According to information accessed off the Internet, Carrera was a renowned 17th century chess player. Vespajo was the pseudonym he used in writing a defense of his chess theory and his challenge to Salvio. This volume appears to be a 19th century copy of his 1635 writings.
